p: Dehydrotumulosic acid (DTA), 3-epi-dehydrotumulosic acid (eDTA), and polyporenic acid C (PAC) were provided by the Kanion Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd. Research Center. Mannose, rhamnose, glucuronide, glucose, galactose, and arabinose were purchased from the National Institute for the Control of Pharmaceutical and Biological Products (Beijing, China).
